AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court: court that knows the taking of evidence required two days, has previously made decisions regarding stops on Interstate Highway 35, and considers factors such as passenger behavior in vehicles
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court Jury: jury that was given instructions to continue deliberation after indicating deadlock, deliberated for approximately 2 hours before sending a note to the judge stating they had not reached a unanimous decision
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court Judge: judge who denied a defense motion for mistrial and instructed the jury to continue deliberation, made oral findings of fact regarding the constitutionality of the stop and search
